item.title: Java Is My Bitch And Delta, It Didnt Work Mate,
item.dc:creator: @hallowed_soul hallowed soul
item.description:
@hallowed_soul wrote:

Im Trying To Make That Zone Where When You Die You Dont Lose Items,

This Is Where I Got To,

To make it easier add it with the method:

Lets start it:


public void areaName() {
if(absX >= 3344 && absX <= 3383 && absY >= 9620 && absY <= 9659 && IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1) {
teleportToX = X;
teleportToY = Y;
sendMessage("Oh dear your dead");
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
refreshSkills();
}
}

I Added That as A Public Void, But You Still Die And Lose Items Etc, When In That Area

Help?

Please Tell Me What To Do Now

Read full topic
item.source: Java Is My Bitch And Delta, It Didnt Work Mate,
